original_title: Dr. Asanka Senanayake wins Most Popular Dental Doctor of the Year Award
original_body_lines: Dr. Asanka Senanayake, the founder of medical centres that provide all types of dental care services under the name of Shine Dental Care in several areas, was awarded as the Most Popular Dental Doctor of the Year at the Lanka Business Awards – 2023 organised by the Business World International Organisation (BWIO). The award ceremony, during which various leading business ventures were honoured with prestigious awards, was recently held at the Taj Samudra Hotel in Colombo. Dr. Senanayake, who is the most popular dental surgeon on social media platforms including Facebook, Instagram and Tiktok, is known as ‘Dr Shine’ worldwide. He is specialised in cosmetic dentistry as well as implantology. Having graduated as a Dental Surgeon (BDS) from the University of Peradeniya, he is committed to taking the dental industry into smart dentistry through a sophisticated range of services.
